title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement robust user authentication with multi-factor security for safe customer login and access.
description: This epic focuses on establishing a secure authentication layer that protects customer access to the self-service banking portal. It will include password encryption, session management, and multi-factor authentication using one-time passwords (OTPs), mobile authenticators, or biometrics. The system will comply with banking security standards, ensuring secure login flows, protection against unauthorized access, and session timeout handling for enhanced privacy and safety.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Design and develop a modern, responsive user interface optimized for all devices and accessibility levels.
description: This epic covers the creation of a device-agnostic, fully responsive user interface for the self-service portal. Users will experience consistent layouts, intuitive navigation, and optimized performance on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Accessibility standards will be followed to ensure usability for all customers, with attention to touch-friendly elements, quick load times, interactive guidance, and ADA/WCAG compliance for inclusive design.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile-Driven Services
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard that displays relevant financial details and products based on user profile.
description: This epic aims to create a dynamic and personalized dashboard that adapts to each user’s banking profile and eligibility data. The dashboard will display account summaries, available services, personalized offers, and key actions such as viewing balances or submitting service requests. Real-time data sourcing will ensure timely updates, and modular dashboards will enhance efficiency for customers managing multiple accounts or services.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable customers to open accounts and request service modifications through digital workflows.
description: This epic entails designing user-friendly workflows that allow customers to open new accounts and modify existing ones digitally. It includes guided step-by-step forms, automatic data validation, digital signatures, and pre-populated customer information. These workflows will reduce manual inputs while maintaining compliance with KYC, AML, and other relevant banking regulations. Automated routing and approvals will minimize processing time and effort.

title: Save and Resume Functionality for Incomplete Applications
summary: Allow customers to save partially completed forms or workflows and resume them later.
description: This epic provides functionality for customers to pause ongoing applications or service requests with the ability to resume them seamlessly at a later stage. Data will be autosaved periodically to ensure work in progress is never lost due to timeout or interruption. The saved data will be securely encrypted, with quick retrieval capabilities, enhancing convenience and user flexibility during the application process.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Implement document upload capabilities for customers to securely provide verification materials.
description: This epic focuses on building a secure document management module that enables customers to upload, manage, and track required documents as part of their digital requests. Features include file format validation, metadata recording, encryption in transit and at rest, and upload progress indicators. The system will support backend verification workflows while ensuring sensitive documents are securely handled across all stages of processing.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide customers with real-time updates and email notifications for submitted requests.
description: This epic introduces a tracking and alert system that offers real-time updates on account openings, service modifications, and ongoing requests. Users can view request statuses, from submission to approval, through a visual timeline. Automated notifications via email or SMS will keep users informed about key milestones. This feature improves transparency, user engagement, and communication efficiency between bank and customer.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a secure, accessible record of all user activities, requests, and portal interactions.
description: This epic delivers a complete activity and audit trail system recording every user interaction such as login attempts, form submissions, document uploads, and completed requests. The portal will present customers with an easy-to-read history of their actions while maintaining immutable backend logs for compliance and administrative auditing. The feature ensures traceability, accountability, and security in all user operations.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal with the bank’s existing core banking system for data consistency.
description: This epic establishes secure integrations between the self-service portal and the core banking systems. It leverages APIs and middleware for bidirectional data synchronization, ensuring that transactions, customer data, and request statuses are updated in real time. The integration layer will handle authentication, logging, error recovery, and retries to guarantee reliable connectivity between systems while adhering to data governance standards.

title: Independent Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop a dedicated portal database optimized for performance, reliability, and security.
description: This epic focuses on creating a specialized database architecture to power the self-service portal with high throughput and reliability. It involves designing tables and caching strategies for performance, implementing data partitioning where necessary, and ensuring synchronization with the bank’s core systems. The independent data store enables fast customer interactions while maintaining audit consistency and backup reliability for critical data.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Management
summary: Implement a role-based permission framework to manage access levels across portal functions.
description: This epic introduces a role-based access control (RBAC) framework that governs user permissions and service visibility based on assigned roles. Customers, administrators, and staff will have distinct access levels ensuring separation of duties. It supports rule-based authorization checks across all services, protects sensitive data, and enforces compliance with regulatory standards related to privacy and internal governance.
